name: R4B-RegulatedAuthorization-R5-RegulatedAuthorization
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R4B RegulatedAuthorization into FHIR R5

element.display: Regulatory approval, clearance or licencing related to a regulated product, treatment, facility or activity e.g. Market Authorization for a Medicinal Product

target.display: Regulatory approval, clearance or licencing related to a regulated product, treatment, facility or activity e.g. Market Authorization for a Medicinal Product
target.comment: R4B `RegulatedAuthorization` maps as Equivalent to R5 `RegulatedAuthorization`

element.display: The legal/regulatory framework or reasons under which this authorization is granted

target.display: The legal/regulatory framework or reasons under which this authorization is granted
target.comment: R4B `RegulatedAuthorization.basis` maps as Equivalent to R5 `RegulatedAuthorization.basis`

element.display: The case or regulatory procedure for granting or amending a regulated authorization. Note: This area is subject to ongoing review and the workgroup is seeking implementer feedback on its use (see link at bottom of page)

target.display: The case or regulatory procedure for granting or amending a regulated authorization. Note: This area is subject to ongoing review and the workgroup is seeking implementer feedback on its use (see link at bottom of page)
target.comment: R4B `RegulatedAuthorization.case` maps as Equivalent to R5 `RegulatedAuthorization.case`

element.display: Applications submitted to obtain a regulated authorization. Steps within the longer running case or procedure

target.display: Applications submitted to obtain a regulated authorization. Steps within the longer running case or procedure
target.comment: R4B `RegulatedAuthorization.case.application` maps as Equivalent to R5 `RegulatedAuthorization.case.application`

element.display: Relevant date for this case

target.display: Relevant date for this case
target.comment: R4B `RegulatedAuthorization.case.date[x]` maps as Equivalent to R5 `RegulatedAuthorization.case.date[x]`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R4B `RegulatedAuthorization.case.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `RegulatedAuthorization.case.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`

element.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing

target.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing
target.comment: R4B `RegulatedAuthorization.case.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `RegulatedAuthorization.case.id`

element.display: Identifier by which this case can be referenced

target.display: Identifier by which this case can be referenced
target.comment: R4B `RegulatedAuthorization.case.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R5 `RegulatedAuthorization.case.identifier`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `RegulatedAuthorization.case.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `RegulatedAuthorization.case.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

element.display: The status associated with the case

target.display: The status associated with the case
target.comment: R4B `RegulatedAuthorization.case.status` maps as Equivalent to R5 `RegulatedAuthorization.case.status`

element.display: The defining type of case

target.display: The defining type of case
target.comment: R4B `RegulatedAuthorization.case.type` maps as Equivalent to R5 `RegulatedAuthorization.case.type`

element.display: Contained, inline Resources

target.display: Contained, inline Resources
target.comment: R4B `RegulatedAuthorization.contained` maps as Equivalent to R5 `RegulatedAuthorization.contained`

element.display: General textual supporting information

target.display: General textual supporting information
target.comment: R4B `RegulatedAuthorization.description` maps as Equivalent to R5 `RegulatedAuthorization.description`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R4B `RegulatedAuthorization.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `RegulatedAuthorization.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`

element.display: The organization that has been granted this authorization, by the regulator

target.display: The organization that has been granted this authorization, by the regulator
target.comment: R4B `RegulatedAuthorization.holder` maps as Equivalent to R5 `RegulatedAuthorization.holder`

element.display: Logical id of this artifact

target.display: Logical id of this artifact
target.comment: R4B `RegulatedAuthorization.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `RegulatedAuthorization.id`

element.display: Business identifier for the authorization, typically assigned by the authorizing body

target.display: Business identifier for the authorization, typically assigned by the authorizing body
target.comment: R4B `RegulatedAuthorization.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R5 `RegulatedAuthorization.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R4B `RegulatedAuthorization.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R5 `RegulatedAuthorization.implicitRules`

element.display: Condition for which the use of the regulated product applies

target.display: Condition for which the use of the regulated product applies
target.comment: R4B `RegulatedAuthorization.indication` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `RegulatedAuthorization.indication` - indication changed from scalar to array (max cardinality from 1 to *)

element.display: The intended use of the product, e.g. prevention, treatment

target.display: The intended use of the product, e.g. prevention, treatment
target.comment: R4B `RegulatedAuthorization.intendedUse` maps as Equivalent to R5 `RegulatedAuthorization.intendedUse`

element.display: Language of the resource content

target.display: Language of the resource content
target.comment: R4B `RegulatedAuthorization.language` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `RegulatedAuthorization.language` - language made the binding required (from Preferred) for http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/all-languages|5.0.0

element.display: Metadata about the resource

target.display: Metadata about the resource
target.comment: R4B `RegulatedAuthorization.meta` maps as Equivalent to R5 `RegulatedAuthorization.meta`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored
target.comment: R4B `RegulatedAuthorization.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `RegulatedAuthorization.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

element.display: The territory in which the authorization has been granted

target.display: The territory in which the authorization has been granted
target.comment: R4B `RegulatedAuthorization.region` maps as Equivalent to R5 `RegulatedAuthorization.region`

element.display: The regulatory authority or authorizing body granting the authorization

target.display: The regulatory authority or authorizing body granting the authorization
target.comment: R4B `RegulatedAuthorization.regulator` maps as Equivalent to R5 `RegulatedAuthorization.regulator`

element.display: The status that is authorised e.g. approved. Intermediate states can be tracked with cases and applications

target.display: The status that is authorised e.g. approved. Intermediate states can be tracked with cases and applications
target.comment: R4B `RegulatedAuthorization.status` maps as Equivalent to R5 `RegulatedAuthorization.status`

element.display: The date at which the current status was assigned

target.display: The date at which the current status was assigned
target.comment: R4B `RegulatedAuthorization.statusDate` maps as Equivalent to R5 `RegulatedAuthorization.statusDate`

element.display: The product type, treatment, facility or activity that is being authorized

target.display: The product type, treatment, facility or activity that is being authorized
target.comment: R4B `RegulatedAuthorization.subject` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R5 `RegulatedAuthorization.subject` - subject has change due to type change: R4B `subject` `Reference` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `subject`

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R4B `RegulatedAuthorization.text` maps as Equivalent to R5 `RegulatedAuthorization.text`

element.display: Overall type of this authorization, for example drug marketing approval, orphan drug designation

target.display: Overall type of this authorization, for example drug marketing approval, orphan drug designation
target.comment: R4B `RegulatedAuthorization.type` maps as Equivalent to R5 `RegulatedAuthorization.type`

element.display: The time period in which the regulatory approval etc. is in effect, e.g. a Marketing Authorization includes the date of authorization and/or expiration date

target.display: The time period in which the regulatory approval etc. is in effect, e.g. a Marketing Authorization includes the date of authorization and/or expiration date
target.comment: R4B `RegulatedAuthorization.validityPeriod` maps as Equivalent to R5 `RegulatedAuthorization.validityPeriod`
